name: ml-game-elective-referral
description: Students try to find a machine-learning-for-games elective; conversation ends with a referral.

events.content: Is there an elective focused on ML for game development? I only see the generic AI listing on the flowchart.
Closest class Iâ€™ve seen is CSC 482 (Game Engine Dev) but it barely touches ML.
Some people use EE 407 (Neural Nets) as a stand-in, but you have to petition for major elective credit.
Ping me or email li.n@acm.calpoly.edu. We keep a list of instructors willing to supervise ML-for-games independent studies each spring.
